thread.title: The Conservatory delivers beautiful ambience - but a below-average food experience - NewsBreak
thread.title_full: The Conservatory delivers beautiful ambience - but a below-average food experience - NewsBreak

author: UV Cavalier Daily
title: The Conservatory delivers beautiful ambience - but a below-average food experience - NewsBreak
text:
4 hours ago Located in the ravishing lobby of the Omni Hotel, The Conservatory restaurant serves New American small plates and entrées in addition to offering an extensive drink menu. With their Restaurant Week menu priced at $35 for a three-course meal — an appetizer, entrée and dessert — the bill for my friend and I totaled around $90, including tip. However, our meal did not reflect the high price — the restaurant left much to be desired in execution and taste. Read full article
Read in NewsBreak
